title: Vaccine Makers Curtail Research and Cut Jobs

title: Should Drug Companies Be Advertising to Consumers?
summary: Aging means “becoming a target” of the industry, one expert said. After decades of debate, politicians of all stripes are proposing bans.

title: Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass
summary: The chairman, Casey Wasserman, has faced criticism ever since his name surfaced in the Epstein files. Mayor Karen Bass is the latest official to call on him to step down.

title: Robert Duvall, ‘Godfather’ and ‘Apocalypse Now’ Actor, Dies at 95

title: Winter Storms Could Bring 8 Feet of Snow to Parts of California
